title: Shattered Bonds
description: When Stephen Moore suddenly disappears in New Jersey, his whereabouts remain a mystery until a car erupts in flames in a nearby town, leading to a major break in a case. Andrea Canning reports.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
